mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as recNum, brd_no, title, young_context, cc, w_date, hits, publicopen, member_id FROM YOUNGROLE_BOARD ORDER BY recNum DESC) WHERE recNum between(#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100 + #{pageNum}*10
INSERT INTO YOUNGROLE_BOARD(brd_no, title, young_context, cc, w_date, hits, publicopen,member_id) VALUES(#{brd_no},#{title},#{young_context},#{cc},#{w_date},#{hits},#{publicopen},#{member_id})
mapper.delete: delete from YOUNGROLE_BOARD where brd_no in ( SELECT brd_no FROM YOUNGROLE_BOARD START WITH brd_no = #{brd_no})
